REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f2847 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-JAPAN-INTERVE 04-13 0062

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF JAPAN INTERVENES IN TOKYO AFTER OPENING
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of Japan intervened in Tokyo to buy dollars just after the market opened, dealers said. The dollar opened at 142.05 yen against 142.15/25 in New York and 142.50 at the close here yesterday. The bank stepped into the market amid selling pressure from interbank dealers, dealers said. REUTER
